Klasse Controller

java.lang.Object
application.controller.Controller
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
ExamScreenController, MainScreenController, StudentScreenController
public abstract class Controller extends Object
Base class for almost all controllers

This class combines almost all controllers and, through the following functions, makes the graphical elements of the individual screens available so that they can be easily displayed in a BorderPane and also exchanged.
